verses.verse: Now Jephthah <WH3316> the Gileadite <WH1569> was <WH1961> a mighty man <WH1368> of valor, <WH2428> and he <WH1931> was the son <WH1121> of a harlot: <WH802> <WH2181> and Gilead <WH1568> begot <WH3205> <WH853> Jephthah. <WH3316>

And Gilead's <WH1568> wife <WH802> bore <WH3205> him sons; <WH1121> and his wife's <WH802> sons <WH1121> grew up, <WH1431> and they thrust out <WH1644> <WH853> Jephthah, <WH3316> and said <WH559> unto him, Thou shalt not <WH3808> inherit <WH5157> in our father's <WH1> house; <WH1004> for <WH3588> thou <WH859> art the son <WH1121> of a strange <WH312> woman. <WH802>

Then Jephthah <WH3316> fled <WH1272> from <WH4480> <WH6440> his brethren, <WH251> and dwelt <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Tob: <WH2897> and there were gathered <WH3950> vain <WH7386> men <WH376> to <WH413> Jephthah, <WH3316> and went out <WH3318> with <WH5973> him.
And it came to pass <WH1961> in process of time, <WH4480> <WH3117> that the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> made war <WH3898> against <WH5973> Israel. <WH3478>

And it was <WH1961> so, that when <WH834> the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> made war <WH3898> against <WH5973> Israel, <WH3478> the elders <WH2205> of Gilead <WH1568> went <WH1980> to fetch <WH3947> <WH853> Jephthah <WH3316> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Tob: <WH2897>
And they said <WH559> unto Jephthah, <WH3316> Come, <WH1980> and be <WH1961> our captain, <WH7101> that we may fight <WH3898> with the children <WH1121> of Ammon. <WH5983>

And Jephthah <WH3316> said <WH559> unto the elders <WH2205> of Gilead, <WH1568> Did not <WH3808> ye <WH859> hate <WH8130> me, and expel <WH1644> me out of my father's <WH1> house? <WH4480> <WH1004> and why <WH4069> are ye come <WH935> unto <WH413> me now <WH6258> when <WH834> ye are in distress? <WH6862>

And the elders <WH2205> of Gilead <WH1568> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Jephthah, <WH3316> Therefore <WH3651> we turn again <WH7725> to <WH413> thee now, <WH6258> that thou mayest go <WH1980> with <WH5973> us, and fight <WH3898> against the children <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983> and be <WH1961> our head <WH7218> over all <WH3605> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Gilead. <WH1568>

And Jephthah <WH3316> said <WH559> unto <WH413> the elders <WH2205> of Gilead, <WH1568> If <WH518> ye <WH859> bring me home again <WH7725> <WH853> to fight <WH3898> against the children <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983> and the LORD <WH3068> deliver <WH5414> them before <WH6440> me, shall I <WH595> be <WH1961> your head? <WH7218>

And the elders <WH2205> of Gilead <WH1568> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Jephthah, <WH3316> The LORD <WH3068> be <WH1961> witness <WH8085> between <WH996> us, if <WH518> we do <WH6213> not <WH3808> so <WH3651> according to thy words. <WH1697>

Then Jephthah <WH3316> went <WH1980> with <WH5973> the elders <WH2205> of Gilead, <WH1568> and the people <WH5971> made <WH7760> him head <WH7218> and captain <WH7101> over <WH5921> them: and Jephthah <WH3316> uttered <WH1696> <WH853> all <WH3605> his words <WH1697> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> in Mizpeh. <WH4709>

And Jephthah <WH3316> sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> unto <WH413> the king <WH4428> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983> saying, <WH559> What <WH4100> hast thou to do with me, that <WH3588> thou art come <WH935> against <WH413> me to fight <WH3898> in my land? <WH776>

And the king <WH4428> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> answered <WH559> unto <WH413> the messengers <WH4397> of Jephthah, <WH3316> Because <WH3588> Israel <WH3478> took away <WH3947> <WH853> my land, <WH776> when they came up <WH5927> out of Egypt, <WH4480> <WH4714> from Arnon <WH4480> <WH769> even unto <WH5704> Jabbok, <WH2999> and unto <WH5704> Jordan: <WH3383> now <WH6258> therefore restore those lands again <WH7725> <WH853> peaceably. <WH7965>
And Jephthah <WH3316> sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> again <WH3254> <WH5750> unto <WH413> the king <WH4428> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon: <WH5983>

And said <WH559> unto him, Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> Jephthah, <WH3316> Israel <WH3478> took not away <WH3947> <WH3808> <WH853> the land <WH776> of Moab, <WH4124> nor the land <WH776> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon: <WH5983>

But <WH3588> when Israel <WH3478> came up <WH5927> from Egypt, <WH4480> <WH4714> and walked <WH1980> through the wilderness <WH4057> unto <WH5704> the Red <WH5488> sea, <WH3220> and came <WH935> to Kadesh; <WH6946>

Then Israel <WH3478> sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> unto <WH413> the king <WH4428> of Edom, <WH123> saying, <WH559> Let me, I pray thee, <WH4994> pass <WH5674> through thy land: <WH776> but the king <WH4428> of Edom <WH123> would not <WH3808> hearken <WH8085> thereto. And in like manner <WH1571> they sent <WH7971> unto <WH413> the king <WH4428> of Moab: <WH4124> but he would <WH14> not <WH3808> consent: and Israel <WH3478> abode <WH3427> in Kadesh. <WH6946>

Then they went along <WH1980> through the wilderness, <WH4057> and compassed <WH5437> <WH853> the land <WH776> of Edom, <WH123> and the land <WH776> of Moab, <WH4124> and came <WH935> by the east side <WH4480> <WH4217> <WH8121> of the land <WH776> of Moab, <WH4124> and pitched <WH2583> on the other side <WH5676> of Arnon, <WH769> but came <WH935> not <WH3808> within the border <WH1366> of Moab: <WH4124> for <WH3588> Arnon <WH769> was the border <WH1366> of Moab. <WH4124>

And Israel <WH3478> sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> unto <WH413> Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> the king <WH4428> of Heshbon; <WH2809> and Israel <WH3478> said <WH559> unto him, Let us pass, <WH5674> we pray thee, <WH4994> through thy land <WH776> into <WH5704> my place. <WH4725>

But Sihon <WH5511> trusted <WH539> not <WH3808> <WH853> Israel <WH3478> to pass <WH5674> through his coast: <WH1366> but Sihon <WH5511> gathered all his people together, <WH622> <WH853> <WH3605> <WH5971> and pitched <WH2583> in Jahaz, <WH3096> and fought <WH3898> against <WH5973> Israel. <WH3478>

And the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> delivered <WH5414> <WH853> Sihon <WH5511> and all <WH3605> his people <WH5971> into the hand <WH3027> of Israel, <WH3478> and they smote <WH5221> them: so Israel <WH3478> possessed <WH3423> <WH853> all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of the Amorites, <WH567> the inhabitants <WH3427> of that <WH1931> country. <WH776>

And they possessed <WH3423> <WH853> all <WH3605> the coasts <WH1366> of the Amorites, <WH567> from Arnon <WH4480> <WH769> even unto <WH5704> Jabbok, <WH2999> and from <WH4480> the wilderness <WH4057> even unto <WH5704> Jordan. <WH3383>

So now <WH6258> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> hath dispossessed <WH3423> <WH853> the Amorites <WH567> from before <WH4480> <WH6440> his people <WH5971> Israel, <WH3478> and shouldest thou <WH859> possess <WH3423> it?

Wilt not <WH3808> thou possess <WH3423> <WH853> that which <WH834> Chemosh <WH3645> thy god <WH430> giveth thee to possess? <WH3423> So whomsoever <WH3605> <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> shall drive out <WH3423> from before <WH4480> <WH6440> us, them will we possess. <WH3423>

And now <WH6258> art thou <WH859> any thing better <WH2896> <WH2896> than Balak <WH4480> <WH1111> the son <WH1121> of Zippor, <WH6834> king <WH4428> of Moab? <WH4124> did he ever strive <WH7378> <WH7378> against <WH5973> Israel, <WH3478> or <WH518> did he ever fight <WH3898> <WH3898> against them,

While Israel <WH3478> dwelt <WH3427> in Heshbon <WH2809> and her towns, <WH1323> and in Aroer <WH6177> and her towns, <WH1323> and in all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> that <WH834> be along by <WH5921> the coasts <WH3027> of Arnon, <WH769> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> years? <WH8141> why <WH4069> therefore did ye not <WH3808> recover <WH5337> them within that <WH1931> time? <WH6256>

Wherefore I <WH595> have not <WH3808> sinned <WH2398> against thee, but thou <WH859> doest <WH6213> me wrong <WH7451> to war <WH3898> against me: the LORD <WH3068> the Judge <WH8199> be judge <WH8199> this day <WH3117> between <WH996> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> and the children <WH1121> of Ammon. <WH5983>
Howbeit the king <WH4428> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> hearkened <WH8085> not <WH3808> unto <WH413> the words <WH1697> of Jephthah <WH3316> which <WH834> he sent <WH7971> <WH413> him.

Then the Spirit <WH7307> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> upon <WH5921> Jephthah, <WH3316> and he passed over <WH5674> <WH853> Gilead, <WH1568> and Manasseh, <WH4519> and passed over <WH5674> <WH853> Mizpeh <WH4708> of Gilead, <WH1568> and from Mizpeh <WH4480> <WH4708> of Gilead <WH1568> he passed over <WH5674> unto the children <WH1121> of Ammon. <WH5983>

And Jephthah <WH3316> vowed <WH5087> a vow <WH5088> unto the LORD, <WH3068> and said, <WH559> If <WH518> thou shalt without fail deliver <WH5414> <WH5414> <WH853> the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> into mine hands, <WH3027>

Then it shall be, <WH1961> that whatsoever <WH834> cometh forth <WH3318> of the doors <WH4480> <WH1817> of my house <WH1004> to meet <WH7125> me, when I return <WH7725> in peace <WH7965> from the children <WH4480> <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983> shall surely be <WH1961> the LORD's, <WH3068> and I will offer it up <WH5927> for a burnt offering. <WH5930>
So Jephthah <WH3316> passed over <WH5674> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> to fight <WH3898> against them; and the LORD <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> them into his hands. <WH3027>

And he smote <WH5221> them from Aroer, <WH4480> <WH6177> even till <WH5704> thou come <WH935> to Minnith, <WH4511> even twenty <WH6242> cities, <WH5892> and unto <WH5704> the plain <WH58> of the vineyards, <WH3754> with a very <WH3966> great <WH1419> slaughter. <WH4347> Thus the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> were subdued <WH3665> before <WH4480> <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And Jephthah <WH3316> came <WH935> to Mizpeh <WH4709> unto <WH413> his house, <WH1004> and, behold, <WH2009> his daughter <WH1323> came out <WH3318> to meet <WH7125> him with timbrels <WH8596> and with dances: <WH4246> and she <WH1931> was his only child; <WH3173> beside <WH4480> her he had neither <WH369> son <WH1121> nor <WH176> daughter. <WH1323>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when he saw <WH7200> her, that he rent <WH7167> <WH853> his clothes, <WH899> and said, <WH559> Alas, <WH162> my daughter! <WH1323> thou hast brought me very low, <WH3766> <WH3766> and thou <WH859> art <WH1961> one of them that trouble <WH5916> me: for I <WH595> have opened <WH6475> my mouth <WH6310> unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> and I cannot <WH3808> <WH3201> go back. <WH7725>

And she said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, My father, <WH1> if thou hast opened <WH6475> <WH853> thy mouth <WH6310> unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> do <WH6213> to me according to that which <WH834> hath proceeded out <WH3318> of thy mouth; <WH4480> <WH6310> forasmuch <WH310> <WH834> as the LORD <WH3068> hath taken <WH6213> vengeance <WH5360> for thee of thine enemies, <WH4480> <WH341> even of the children <WH4480> <WH1121> of Ammon. <WH5983>

And she said <WH559> unto <WH413> her father, <WH1> Let this <WH2088> thing <WH1697> be done <WH6213> for me: let me alone <WH7503> <WH4480> two <WH8147> months, <WH2320> that I may go up <WH1980> and down <WH3381> upon <WH5921> the mountains, <WH2022> and bewail <WH1058> <WH5921> my virginity, <WH1331> I <WH595> and my fellows. <WH7464>

And he said, <WH559> Go. <WH1980> And he sent her away <WH7971> <WH853> for two <WH8147> months: <WH2320> and she <WH1931> went <WH1980> with her companions, <WH7464> and bewailed <WH1058> <WH5921> her virginity <WH1331> upon <WH5921> the mountains. <WH2022>

And it came to pass <WH1961> at the end <WH4480> <WH7093> of two <WH8147> months, <WH2320> that she returned <WH7725> unto <WH413> her father, <WH1> who did <WH6213> with her according to <WH853> his vow <WH5088> which <WH834> he had vowed: <WH5087> and she <WH1931> knew <WH3045> no <WH3808> man. <WH376> And it was <WH1961> a custom <WH2706> in Israel, <WH3478>

That the daughters <WH1323> of Israel <WH3478> went <WH1980> yearly <WH4480> <WH3117> <WH3117> to lament <WH8567> the daughter <WH1323> of Jephthah <WH3316> the Gileadite <WH1569> four <WH702> days <WH3117> in a year. <WH8141>
